Disability Support Scholarship

Eligibility Requirements

This scholarship is available to students who:

  • Have a certified disability
  • Provide evidence of disability (disability certificate or medical documentation)
  • Are enrolled in postgraduate taught programmes
  • Demonstrate financial need

Required Documentation: Applicants must provide a certified disability certificate or medical evidence from a qualified professional.

Eligible Disabilities: Hearing impairment, mobility disabilities, visual impairment, mental health conditions

Amount: Â£3,000 per year

Deadline: 2026-07-15

Level: Postgraduate taught programmes
